name: Loopush
description:
This is a game made in ByteDance game jam. The theme of the game is Loop.

A loop timeline is designed in the game. Combined with the playing method of Sokoban, the decryption is completed by cooperating with yourself in the previous loop.

If you are stuck at a certain level, we also provide a strategy, please download [Loopush_Solution.pdf] and check it.

The sound quality of HTML version is not good. Download and run it on PC for better experience.

Game Design/Program: Fululu

Art: 平面镜

Level Design: 极夜烛龙

Video page: 【GameJam】循环推箱子？《Loopush》48小时游戏制作
